trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of non-selectable dates in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar" /> 中無法選取之日期的集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarBlackoutDatesCollection> contains <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarDateRange> objects that specify multiple dates that cannot be selected by a user.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarBlackoutDatesCollection>包含<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarDateRange>物件，以指定多個日期無法選取的使用者。

trans-unit.source: To make all past dates not selectable, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarBlackoutDatesCollection.AddDatesInPast%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要讓所有過去的日期不能選取，您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarBlackoutDatesCollection.AddDatesInPast%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: XAML Property Element Usage
trans-unit.target: XAML 屬性項目用法

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: XAML 值

trans-unit.source: *oneOrMoreCalendarDateRanges*
trans-unit.target: *oneOrMoreCalendarDateRanges*

trans-unit.source: One or more object elements of type <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarDateRange>.
trans-unit.target: 一或多個物件項目類型的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarDateRange>。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar> in code and markup that has some dates that cannot be selected.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>中程式碼和標記具有無法選取某些日期。

trans-unit.source: The preceding example produces output that is similar to the following illustration.
trans-unit.target: 上述範例會產生類似下圖的輸出。

trans-unit.source: ![Calendar with dates that cannot be selected.](~/add/media/ndp-calendarblackout.png "Calendar with dates that cannot be selected.")
trans-unit.target: ![無法選取的日期的行事曆。](~/add/media/ndp-calendarblackout.png "行事曆日期無法選取。")

trans-unit.source: Calendar with dates that cannot be selected
trans-unit.target: 無法選取的日期的行事曆

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar" /> whose dates this object represents.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar" />，這個物件會表示其日期。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarBlackoutDatesCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarBlackoutDatesCollection" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Adds all dates before <see cref="P:System.DateTime.Today" /> to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="P:System.DateTime.Today" /> 之前的所有日期加入到集合中。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to prevent users from selecting dates that are in the past.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法，以避免使用者選取過去的日期。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar> that includes a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Loaded> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Calendar>包含<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Loaded>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Loaded> event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例所示<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Loaded>事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The event handler calls the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarBlackoutDatesCollection.AddDatesInPast%2A> method to make only future dates selectable.
trans-unit.target: 事件處理常式呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Controls.CalendarBlackoutDatesCollection.AddDatesInPast%2A>可選取方法，只讓未來的日期。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that represents whether this collection contains the specified date or dates.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，這個值表示此集合是否包含指定的日期。

trans-unit.source: The date to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的日期。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that represents whether this collection contains the specified date.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，這個值表示此集合是否包含指定的日期。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the collection contains the specified date; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此集合包含指定的日期，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The start of the date range.
trans-unit.target: 日期範圍的開頭。

trans-unit.source: The end of the date range.
trans-unit.target: 日期範圍的結尾。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that represents whether this collection contains the specified range of dates.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，這個值表示此集合是否包含指定的日期範圍。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if all dates in the range are contained in the collection; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果此範圍內的所有日期都包含在集合中，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The range of dates to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的日期範圍。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that represents whether this collection contains any dates in the specified range of dates.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，這個值表示此集合是否包含指定之日期範圍內的任何日期。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if any dates in the range are contained in the collection; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果有任何此範圍內的日期包含在集合中，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。
